title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-6.2 - Field citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-6.2 - Field citation

State Regulations

Upon determining that a probable violation of a provision
of this Part has occurred, the department may issue a field citation to a
respondent, identifying specific provisions alleged to have been
violated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
